column1: Little Goat Diner////the goat almighty burger is amazeballs. goat pattie alone would have made a fine burger (of which is available for an extra $2 on any burger) but the braised beef was the winner in the meat race. the triple threat burger of braised beef
column3: goat pattie mountain hugged in brioche is even better paired w/the hash and biscuits + gravy.
